column5: With spring approaching, I had in mind of some spring trout fishing on the grand river. I was wondering if anyone knew of spots on the grand to catch steelhead or brown trout. Any help would be appreciated Thanks guys
You aren't going to get much of a response with 2 posts, both of them asking for 'spots'
damn you buddy I'll come to Barrie and knock you the damn out
Yeah, you sound like someone people would like fishing their run.
This thread is awesome!  Lock please admin?
Tough guys on the internet, gotta love 'em.....
C'mon down and visit us on the grand, you sound like a swell guy!
Knock you the damn out ? HAHAHAHAHAHA. Priceless!
I think damn is OFC DEFAULT for damn
Yep. Damn is OFC default for the effbomb.  Somebody pass the popcorn....
Not a good way to start your membership here at OFC. Read the rules and then post an introductory is the preferred manner to make friends.      Art
